Show.Name: The Matrix
Show.Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against the controllers of it.

Show.Name: The Matrix Reloaded
Show.Description: Neo and the rebel leaders estimate that they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. During this, Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.

Show.Name: The Matrix Revolutions
Show.Description: War breaks out on the scorched Earth as the machines invade Zion. Whereas Reloaded is about life, Revolutions addresses death.
